item.name: 10 Days in Africa
item.comment: Finally a geography lesson that is enjoyable by even those who do not like geography (my kids). A Hit at work too. Thank you "Out of the Box".

item.name: 10 Days in the USA
item.comment: Finally a geography lesson that is enjoyable by even those who do not like geography (my kids). A Hit at work too. Thank you "Out of the Box".

item.name: 1313 Dead End Drive
item.comment: Not quite sure what all the bad ratings are for. It is a wonderful kids game. Pain in the ass to set up though.

item.name: Afrika Korps
item.comment: This was actually one of my first games along with Tactics. While I like the game I do have to compare it to todays standards.

item.name: Age of Mythology: The Boardgame
item.comment: I enjoy it. The combat dice fest is kind of dumb but the game in all is good.

item.name: Age of Steam
item.comment: I like it but the screw you factor is a little much some times.

item.name: Aladdin's Dragons
item.comment: Love this game. Easy rules, high suspense, lots of decisions, few bids, and little money. Fun...

item.name: Amazonas
item.comment: This is not a bad game and I wanted to really like it but everyone I show it to is just not impressed. I like it but it seems that the options are limited.

item.name: Attika
item.comment: Nice city building game.

item.name: The Awful Green Things From Outer Space
Babylon
item.comment: I played from the rules on Bruno's site using poker chips and I like game. It is probably the quickest game I have ever played and requires a look ahead a few moves to win. Quick game for when you are feeling your brain is rotting away.

item.name: Battle Line
item.comment: I really enjoy this game

item.name: Battle Masters
item.comment: Need lots of space and really it is a dice fest.

item.name: Battlecards: World Conflict – Pacific Theatre – Starter Set
BattleTech
item.comment: I have always liked this game.

item.name: Blazing Camels
item.comment: Ok game. Simple rules with lots of luck.

item.name: Blokus
item.comment: I enjoy the mind meld with the kids with this one

item.name: Burn Rate
item.comment: Well the people in the office dig it. The game can be played over lunch too. Though there seems to be a lot of times when you just have to discard and start a new. Be careful though, no brain employees and contractors will cost you the game.

item.name: Cairo
item.comment: This is a flickin fun dexterity game. But watch out you might put your eye out.

item.name: Carcassonne: Hunters and Gatherers
item.comment: The only reason I do not give it a higher rating is that the tiles are just too busy and sometimes hard to look at.

item.name: Caribbean
item.comment:
Easy rules and some pretty tense playing. I was having doubts at first but it turned out to play very nicely and very tense. Glad I picked it up.
Bryan

item.name: Catan
item.comment: Easy and Fun. What more can you ask for.

item.name: Caylus
item.comment: lots of ways to win and lots of choices. Great game.

item.name: Chairs
item.comment: This is a stacking game where it the chairs get hard to stack fast.

item.name: Checkers
item.comment: Pass some time

item.name: Chess
item.comment: Chess is always a good game

item.name: Chicken Cha Cha Cha
item.comment: Great kids game

item.name: China
item.comment: China is a great game with just a few modifications to the Web of Power game system.

item.name: China Moon
item.comment: Go Froggy Go!. My son and I love it.

item.name: Clans
item.comment: Good game that is more on the abstract side with simple rules and very difficult to master. Although I like the game I am not many people who care that much for it. Quickly becoming one of my favorites.

item.name: Clash of the Gladiators
item.comment: I like it. My kid likes it. For a dice game it is pretty good.

item.name: Coda
item.comment: Very short deduction game. Can be played when you just don't have the time.

item.name: Conquest of the Empire
item.comment: Once a person gets ahead there is no stopping them. Nice peices, Sorry game...

item.name: Dino Hunt
item.comment: More dinos than you can shake a stick at.

item.name: Dr. Seuss Green Eggs and Ham Game
Dragonland
item.comment: Wy wife and son like this game. Good set collecting game. After playing a few more times this one grows on me.

item.name: Dungeon Twister
item.comment: Kind of reminds me of The Confrontation in a dungeon atmosphere. I like it but the card board pieces seem a bit on the cheap side. Need minitures to make more interesting.

item.name: DVONN
item.comment: Probably the best game in the series. One of my favoriates

item.name: EastFront
item.comment: Takes too long for me.
item.conditiontext: Not sealed but new in package.

item.name: Easy Come, Easy Go
item.comment: For a dice game this is not too bad. Very simple and easy to learn.

item.name: Emerald
item.comment: Good easy game to learn and to play with young kids and old alike. Best played with 3.

item.name: Executive Decision
item.comment: Oldie but goodie

item.name: Fire and Ice
item.comment: Abstract with no luck involved. The board and bits are first rate.

item.name: Flowerpower
item.comment: Wife digs it so it can't be that bad.

item.name: Fortress America
item.comment: Another game in the MB series that is very unbalanced.

item.name: Frank's Zoo
item.comment: A trip to the zoo.

item.name: Fresh Fish
item.comment: To hard to explain the rules.

item.name: Galloping Pigs
item.comment: Kids dig racing the pork.

item.name: The Game of Life in Monstropolis
Go Away Monster!
item.comment: Very good search and find game for 3-4 year olds.

item.name: Goosebumps: Terror in the Graveyard Game
Gouda! Gouda!
item.comment: A good children's racing game.

item.name: Gulo Gulo
item.comment: Fun fun fun for very young and old alike. If you have kids this will be a hit. Reminds me some what of another favorite of mine - Cartagena. It is a must buy for me.

item.name: Hang in There!
item.comment: Mindless fun.

item.name: Harpoon (1st & 3rd edition)
item.comment: Too damn long and complicated for very little payoff.

item.name: Heave Ho!
item.comment: Has every thing a game needs women, booze, and a battle of strength. Fun and easy...8^)

item.name: HeroClix
item.comment: Super Hero Action. I really am enjoying this.

item.name: Hisss
item.comment: Great color matching game for very young children.

item.name: Ikusa
item.comment: Good game but takes way way too long.

item.name: Industrial Waste
item.comment: Buying, Selling, Firing, and Hiring. Lots of fun.

item.name: Ingenious
item.comment: Great game that plays easy and very well.

item.name: John Prados' Third Reich
item.comment: I have enjoyed Third Reich for a long time. Have not played it in ages but still very good. Better pack a lunch and some coffee though because you are going to be there for a while.

item.name: Jurassic Park III Island Survival Game
item.comment: Not much of a game but my 6 year old like to eat my people when I play the humans.

item.name: Leaping Lilypads
item.comment: What can I say. My 4 year old ask for it almost every night.

item.name: Leaping Lizards
item.comment: go game with kids.

item.name: The Lewis & Clark Adventure Game
item.comment: Very educational rummy game showing L&C trip across America.

item.name: Light Speed
item.comment: Fast. Fast. Fast. A real time game that is pretty good but actually not bad as a turn based game if you want to space shoot out with young kids.

item.name: Lightning: Midway – June 4th to June 6th, 1942
item.comment: Great two player card game.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: Friends & Foes
Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
item.comment: Kind of like stratego with battle and magic cards.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation (Deluxe Edition)
Lord of the Rings: The Duel
Lucky Catch
item.comment: Great for children. My 4 year old loves it.

item.name: Maharaja: The Game of Palace Building in India
Manga Manga
item.comment: yep. Just like the reviews say. Its bad. Surprising coming from Uberplay.
item.conditiontext: On a good trade I will throw this peice of crap in for free.

item.name: Master Labyrinth
item.comment: Good puzzle game

item.name: Maya Madness
item.comment: Pretty basic as a game but makes a very good tool for teaching kids addition and subtraction. Kind of fun too.

item.name: MedFront
item.comment: still in shrink wrap

item.name: Medici
item.comment: I like this game. Try and optimize your ship value, number of commodities, and money. A classic.

item.name: Memoir '44: Eastern Front
item.comment: I like it but should have been packaged with the new board. $30 for this expansion seems a bit on the expensive side. The box it came in bites. Needed something better than plastic crap to store them in. other than that I like it.

item.name: Memoir '44: Pacific Theater
item.comment: adds more to a great system

item.name: Memoir '44: Terrain Pack
item.comment: Unnessary for the game. If you are going to buy any of the expansions get the East Front expansion and the new board (for look and feel). Save this one till last. It is also a bit pricy.

item.name: Memoir '44: Winter/Desert Board Map
item.comment: Nice to have but not necessary. I agree that the board should have came with the Russian pack.

item.name: Midnight Party
item.comment: Hugo's at it again.

item.name: Mystery Rummy: Al Capone and the Chicago Underworld
Mystery Rummy: Murders in the Rue Morgue
Oceania
item.conditiontext: Opened and played with but contents are mint

item.name: Odin's Ravens
item.comment: Great card game.

item.name: Once Upon a Time: Dark Tales
item.comment: it is an ok addition to the original. I was really hoping for a bit more though.

item.name: Pass the Pigs
item.comment: very compact and a good way to kill some time.

item.name: Phoenix
item.comment: In a colorful sort of way I kind of like it. Actually not too bad and one eye pleasing to look at.

item.name: Pick Picknic
item.comment: One of my favorite games to cross over between the kids and adults.
item.conditiontext: still sealed. Rio Grande version Pick Picknic

item.name: Piecepack
item.comment: A great little game system also many game rules can be downloaded at http://www.piecepack.org/ and http://www.ludism.org/ppwiki.

item.name: Pirateer
item.comment: NO FUN!!!!

item.name: Piraten-Pitt
item.comment: One of the best children's game on the market.

item.name: Power Grid
item.comment: Great Game
item.conditiontext: Opened but unplayed. Rio Grande Version. Complete.

item.name: Puerto Rico
item.comment: Great game but I get tired of it after a couple of times

item.name: PÜNCT
item.comment: great game

item.name: Quarto!
item.comment: Simple, Quick, requires thinking. It is one of the best.

item.name: Quicksand
item.comment: Quick and fun. Works good as a filler.

item.name: Ra
item.comment: As close to 10 as it gets for me.

item.name: Rat-a-Tat Cat
item.comment: Great kids game to practice on memory, counting, luck, and a little bit of strategy

item.name: Ricochet Robots
item.comment: This game is a good mind workout because of the puzzle aspect of it.

item.name: Rise and Decline of the Third Reich
item.comment: Too many rules

item.name: Risk: Star Wars – The Clone Wars Edition
item.comment: Risk with a nice starwars theme. I do not care much for the order 66 though.

item.name: Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition
Safari Jack
item.comment: Well... I have the color version and I was expecting animals. There was none. Game was ok but nothing to get excited about.

item.name: Saint Petersburg
item.comment: Lots of people like this game but I am not one of them.

item.name: Samurai
item.comment: I like this surround with tiles game.

item.name: San Juan
item.comment: If you like Puerto Rico then you will like this game. I would like to see other themes built on this card system.

item.name: Scarab Lords
item.comment: A good 2 person struggle for power game. I like the added ability to modify a deck after a hand. Best of all it is non - collectable.

item.name: SET
item.comment: Works well solo. A good workout for the eyes and mind.

item.name: Stampede!
item.comment: Thought the kids would like it. I thought wrong.

item.name: Star Trek: Starship Tactical Combat Simulator
item.conditiontext: Used but in good condition. Complete.

item.name: Star Wars: Epic Duels
item.comment: Fun Fun. It is one of my favorites
item.conditiontext: Opened but never been played with.

item.name: Star Wars: Episode 1 – Clash of the Lightsabers
Star Wars: Jedi Unleashed
item.comment: Not very fun.

item.name: Star Wars: The Queen's Gambit
item.comment: lots and lots bits with this one. A good game to boot.

item.name: Stratego: The Lord of the Rings
item.comment: I like everyting stratego. Played it as a kid and still play it now. Following in my footsteps it is my sons favorite game.

item.name: StreetSoccer
item.comment: The rules are simple enough and the game is fun.

item.name: Sumo Arena
item.comment: I just don't like multiplayer games where players are elimated early. It is ok for 2 player games or game ending situations.

item.name: Sunken City
item.comment: This is actually one of my favorites when I play with my kids.

item.name: Tactics II
item.comment: Not so much a great game compared to what is out there but a good teacher of the basics.

item.name: Taj Mahal
item.comment: Great influance of regions game by the Good Dr. himself.

item.name: Tally Ho!
item.comment: Good game to play with kids. We played this on our camping trip in the backyard and had a blast.

item.name: Tank Battle
item.comment: Battleship like play with tanks. Kind of boring compared to today's standards

item.name: Thingamajig
item.comment: Fun party game. Must be drunk to really enjoy.

item.name: Through the Desert
item.comment: Easy rules, lots of scoring, lots of fun.

item.name: Ticket to Ride
item.comment: Wonderful...Wonderful...Wonderful game of building railway connections. My favorite game.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Märklin
item.comment: More of the same but I like it.

item.name: TransAmerica
item.conditiontext: Played with. German version. Complete and in good shape.

item.name: Uglydoll Card Game
item.comment: Terrible game. I played this with my 5 and 10 year old and turned out to be a disaster. Nothing more than a very competive race for cards.

item.name: UNO
item.comment: Good ole UNO. Cant go wrong when you are having a party. Lots of beer keeps it interesting.

item.name: Vampire Hunter
item.comment: Needs a new set of rules.

item.name: Vampire: The Eternal Struggle
item.comment: What can I say. It just did not do it for me

item.name: Villa Paletti
item.comment: If you build it it will fall.

item.name: War and Peace
item.comment: Another way to long and way to complicated game

item.name: Weapons & Warriors: Castle Combat Set
item.comment: Load em up and fire. Great game to play with your kids in the 6-10 year range.

item.name: Weapons & Warriors: Pirate Battle
item.comment: Lots of cool pirate stuff. Arrrr..

item.name: Werewolf
item.comment: Besides the elimation aspect this is a good game.

item.name: WestFront
item.comment: Just takes too long.

item.name: Wildlife Safari
item.comment: Another fun game that is easy to play.

item.name: Wildside
item.comment: A quick game for right before bed time.

item.name: Winner's Circle
item.comment: Simple but fun.

item.name: Wits & Wagers
item.comment: I really was not sure what to expect when I first played it but it turned out to be a lot of fun. I will have to try it on people at the next party I go to.

item.name: Wooly Bully
item.comment: ok but nothing special. Easy to play though.

item.name: Wreckage
item.comment: Fun little mini car war game.

item.name: X-Bugs
item.comment: Game is a lot of fun.

item.name: YINSH
item.comment: This is truly a mind bender. I dig it.

item.name: You're Bluffing!
item.comment: My family being farmers and ranchers this is always a hit when we get together.

item.name: Yu-Gi-Oh Millennium Game
item.comment: Pretty bad.

item.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game
item.comment: Another game where it seems to take a ton of money to be competitive. Also when a dual starts going one players way it is difficult to recover in time.

item.name: Zingo!
item.comment: Helps kids learn to spell and sound out words. The problem we have is that they like to go fast to get to the next tiles. It is a well requested game at our family table.
